rules: You are working on a Next.js 14+ project with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui components.
The project is a music events website for Tenerife with the following structure:
- Components in /components directory with shadcn/ui components in /components/ui
- Data files in /data directory (events_tenerife.json, news.json, venues_tenerife.json)
- Use Tailwind CSS classes for styling
- Follow React best practices and hooks
- Use proper error handling and loading states
- Use proper SEO practices with metadata
- Always check existing components before creating new ones
- Use the existing data structure from JSON files
- Ensure all new components are properly typed
- Follow the existing file naming conventions

branching_policy.description: All changes must be made in feature branches derived from 'main'. Each Cursor task must automatically create a new branch named according to the task type and ID.

rules: Always provide complete, working code examples
Use TypeScript interfaces for data structures
